title: Reasons for opposing same-sex marriage in the United States in 2012
summary: This statistic shows the results of a survey among 559 industrial enterprises on their opinion on the Reasons nation in United States .
As of 2012 , 47 % of respondents stated Morally_wrong/Have_traditional_beliefs was currently the Reasons Month in United States .
